ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pulp and Paper Effluent Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PULP AND PAPER EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to ensure that the requirement for mills to deposit effluent only to wastewater systems regulated by the WASTEWATER SYSTEMS EFFLUENT REGULATIONS.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0185 Publication Date: 2018-10-03
